channel.title: How to Change thieving Loot?
channel.description:
Hi, i'm a bit new to This Version.. i'm using a 562 interface etc. I'm having a problem finding out how to change the loot for when thieving, i want to change it so that when you steal from the store table, it will put ( x ) amount of money in your invent per pickpocket.
Link or comment below please <3 cheers

item.title: How to Change thieving Loot?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Yeah, we have no idea what revision you’re using based off of " i’m using a 562 interface etc."
If you’re using a 562, then look up a tutorial on that.

Honestly, you should search the ID of the stall in the file that handles your first click object packet.

Read full topic
